results.title: RECURRENT IMPETIGO HERPETIFORMIS WITH DIABETES AND HYPOALBUMINEMIA SUCCESSFULLY TREATED WITH CYCLOSPORINE, ALBUMIN, INSULIN AND METFORMIN
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Impetigo</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007169 @@@Impetigo herpetiformis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Impetigo</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007169 @@@IH@@@) is rare, @DISEASE_Skin_Diseases_Vesiculobullous @DISEASE_MESH:D012872 @@@pustular dermatoses of pregnancy@@@ posing serious risk to maternal and fetal well-being.
